name: mcp-bundler
description: Combine multiple MCP servers into a single unified endpoint
long_description: MCP Bundler enables you to bundle multiple MCP servers together into a single composite server. This wrapper demonstrates bundling Mercury Spec Ops and other servers. You can customize which sub-servers are included and configure their environment variables through a unified interface.
